attributes.action: Refuse to support the USA in war on unequal terms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this Iraq war and the last one a number of UK service personnel have been killed or injured by 'friendly fire'.  The US blocks any enquiries and refuses to take responsibility.  At the same time we cooperate when it demands extradition, etc.  This arrogance is hardly the behaviour of an ally and we should place demands that mutual respect and cooperation must be in place before we enter into any conflict at the request of the USA.
